# 易性癖者 - Mandarin Chinese–English Dictionary

## 易性癖者

![易性癖者](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

[transsexual](https://dictionary.cambridge.org/ko/%EC%82%AC%EC%A0%84/%EC%98%81%EC%96%B4-%EC%A4%91%EA%B5%AD%EC%96%B4-%EA%B0%84%EC%B2%B4/transsexual) uk

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio

/us /trænˈsek.ʃu.əl/

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio

/trænzˈsek.ʃu.əl/ noun

a person who feels that they are not the same gender as the physical body they was born with, or who does not fit easily into being either a male or a female

([**Cambridge Chinese (Simplified)-English Dictionary**](https://dictionary.cambridge.org/ko/%EC%82%AC%EC%A0%84/%EC%A4%91%EA%B5%AD%EC%96%B4-%EA%B0%84%EC%B2%B4-%EC%98%81%EC%96%B4/ "Cambridge Chinese (Simplified)-English Dictionary")的 **易性癖者** 번역 © Cambridge University Press)

- 翻译
- 性别
- 社会学

## 评论 
- “对不同性别认同的讨论越来越受到重视。”
